alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 10:13PM EST until January 30 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches for a storm total of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Oxford, Northern Franklin and Central Somerset Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM EST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
